channel.title: Xiejra & Mr. Serpent - Green Sun
channel.description:
Hey what’s up? Been a while since I released something so here you are. Pretty dope collab with @MrSerpent So go check him out aswell.
Got super experimental in the drop because Why not eh? Anyway I hope you enjoy, Feed back for the both of us would be greatly appreciated!
Listen here: https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/xiejra-mr-serpent-green-sun
~X

item.title: Xiejra & Mr. Serpent - Green Sun
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
Thats a really good idea. Should’ve tried that glad you liked it.

Read full topic

item.title: Xiejra & Mr. Serpent - Green Sun
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Good job gents prefer second drop but overall fantastically done. Would love to hear a vocal treatment, either some chops or full on vocals I think you got some good points where it’d be such a good fit.

Really smooth though sounds great!

Read full topic

item.title: Xiejra & Mr. Serpent - Green Sun
item.dc:creator: AnirudhKhanna
item.description:
Xiejra, this is so amazing! I really like the violins you did there (although if it were me, I would make it an octave lower), very nice ‘hour.’ That drop was fantastic. I like the little details you added (especially the growls). This was a great collab :D.

Read full topic
